thread.title: Arizona bans Uber's driverless car tests after accident

title: Arizona bans Uber's driverless car tests after accident
text:
Arizona bans Uber's driverless car tests after accident 8:00am BST - 01:04 
The governor of Arizona on Monday suspended Uber's ability to test self-driving cars on public roads in the state following a fatal crash last week that killed a 49-year-old pedestrian. Ryan Brooks reports.
